heroes.name: npc_dota_hero_spirit_breaker
heroes.bio_loc: 裂魂人巴拉森来自元素领域，他高傲、强大、凶猛且精通元素之力，来到物质世界参与那些会影响到元素世界的事件。为此他准备了一个能派上用处的形态，既存在于我们的物质世界，又存在于物质世界之外。他的物理形态来自于我们的物质世界，又像牛又像人，有蹄和手，这个外表象征着他的力量、速度与狡猾。他戴着的鼻环则暗示了他侍奉于一位藏在幕后的主人，而这个世界对他来说不过是元素世界的影子。
heroes.hype_loc: 兼具极高的机动性和攻击性，裂魂人可以跨越整个地图发动冲刺，使敌人陷入战斗。手中沉重的灯笼痛击着敌人，每次敲出的重击让他们意识模糊。他的敌人可以逃，但是他们无处可藏。
heroes.npe_desc_loc: 可以向地图上任意位置的目标冲去

abilities.name: spirit_breaker_charge_of_darkness
abilities.desc_loc:
Spirit Breaker fixes his sight on an enemy unit and starts charging through all objects, starting at %min_movespeed_bonus_pct%%% of the bonus speed and reaching his max speed after %windup_time%s.

All enemy units passed through and the targeted unit will be hit by a Greater Bash. If the targeted unit dies, Spirit Breaker will change his target to the nearest enemy unit to that location.
abilities.lore_loc: Barathrum erupts from the darkness with unwieldy force.
notes_loc: Spirit Breaker passes through trees, cliffs, and units.
The charge indicator is visible only to allies.
Spirit Breaker gains shared vision of the target.
abilities.shard_loc: Increases Charge of Darkness Bonus Speed by %bonus_movement_speed%.
facets_loc: 暗影冲刺的移动速度加成会在冲刺结束后逐渐消失。

special_values.name: charge_for_max_linger
special_values.heading_loc: 最长粘滞时间所需冲刺时间：

abilities.name: spirit_breaker_bulldoze
abilities.desc_loc: Spirit Breaker gains movement speed and status resistance to ram through enemies. Can be used while charging.
abilities.lore_loc: Barathrum warps the fabric of reality around him, lessening its influence on his physical form.

abilities.name: spirit_breaker_greater_bash
abilities.desc_loc: Gives a chance to stun and knockback an enemy unit on an attack. Deals a percentage of movement speed as damage.
abilities.lore_loc: The signature strike of Barathrum's ghostly ball and chain.
notes_loc: Does not stack with Skull Basher.
Break disables the passive percent Chance to Bash. Does not disable Greater Bash application from Charge of Darkness or Nether Strike.
facets_loc: 过去%bonus_chance_duration%秒内对不止一名英雄触发了巨力重击就会使重击的概率提升。第一个英雄之后每个英雄都会使巨力重击的概率提升%bonus_chance_pct%%%。

special_values.name: damage
special_values.heading_loc: 移动速度转化为伤害比例：

abilities.name: spirit_breaker_planar_pocket
abilities.desc_loc: Barathrum distorts the fabric of planar space, increasing his own magic resistance and redirecting enemy hero spells in a radius towards him.
abilities.lore_loc: Barathrum's unyielding focus forms a pocket of planar convergence from which not even the most powerful arcane energies can escape.

abilities.name: spirit_breaker_herd_mentality
abilities.desc_loc: The hero on your team whose level is lower than anybody else's on your team gains %xp_gain_rate%%% more experience.

abilities.name: spirit_breaker_nether_strike
abilities.desc_loc: Spirit Breaker slips into the nether realm, reappearing next to his hapless victim. Upon reappearing, a Greater Bash of the current level occurs and deals bonus damage. Knocks back for double the normal distance.
abilities.lore_loc: Barathrum temporarily returns to the realm from where he came, bringing with him the retribution of both worlds.
notes_loc: Spirit Breaker appears behind the target to deliver the bash.
abilities.shard_loc: Causes Nether Strike to grant spell immunity, and deal extra damage and apply Break.
facets_loc: 被幽冥一击击中的敌方目标受到友方的击退效果的移动距离更远。

facets.description_loc: 暗影冲刺的移动速度加成会在冲刺结束后逐渐消失。
facets.name: spirit_breaker_bull_rush

facets.description_loc: 如果近期内对不止一名英雄触发巨力重击，那么重击的概率将会提升。
facets.name: spirit_breaker_bulls_hit

new_abilities.name: spirit_breaker_herd_mentality
new_abilities.desc_loc: 己方队伍中等级最低的英雄会额外获得%xp_gain_rate%%%经验。
